ComicInfo.Summary:
Garden Of Eden Part Five: Dare discovers the truth about Obadiah Crowe.
Cousin George, Part 7: The tramps Zero helped now come to his aid.
The Cursed Earth Chapter 11: Battle Of The Burger Barons: Judge Dredd arrives in an area where there's a battle between Burger King and MacDonalds for control of the territory.
Inferno: Giant is abducted by a mechanical version of an old nemesis.
Ant Wars [Part 1]: An insecticide is tested on an anthill in the Brazilian jungle with devastating consequences.
